page.title: 03Employment in East Cornwall
page.content: In{Latchley}and{Chilsworthy}there are quite a lot of{retired people}who spend their time pursuing a variety of interests such as gardening or walking. There are quite a number of{farmers}in our section. The majority are dairy or beef farmers because there is much rough grazing land in the area. The{increase in building}has led to more jobs for{electricians, carpenters and{bricklayers. In a survey we found several men who were in the{navy}or who worked in the {Devonport Dockyard, Plymouth.}These people go to work by car. There used to be a good number of {market gardeners}in this area but the cost of tranporting produce together with that of heating greenhouses has practically eliminated this.
